1021786823524110336.text: https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/304725  -> beautiful attack. a point has two coordinates x and y, but the protocol only validated x. replace y with 0, the public key becomes (x, 0) which always has order 2. this forces the shared secret to be the point at infinity with probability of 25%
